foods.name: Tteokbokki (Rice Cakes)
foods.description: Savor the chewy delight of soft spicy rice cakes, glazed in a rich, fiery sauce. Perfect for sharing, this quintessential Korean comfort food is a must-try.

foods.name: Mat-Tang (Fried Sweet Potatoes)
foods.description: Indulge in golden-fried sweet potatoes, candied to perfection and drizzled with a sweet garlic sauce, offering a unique blend of textures and flavors.

foods.name: Dak Gang Jeong (Deep-Fried Boneless Chicken)
foods.description: Experience the crunch with our deep-fried boneless chicken, glazed in Sweet & Spicy or Soy Garlic for a memorable fusion of Korean flavors. Specify your choice of glaze.

foods.name: Japchae (Glass Noodles)
foods.description: Glass noodles and saut√©ed vegetables, tossed in a savory sauce, make for a delightful mix of textures and tastes, showcasing the best of Korean stir-fry.

foods.name: Vegetarian Dumpling
foods.description: Our deep-fried vegetable dumplings are a crispy wonder, filled with a hearty mix of vegetables, perfect for a veggie-packed bite.

foods.name: Kim Ma Ri (Deep-Fried Seaweed Rolls)
foods.description: Dive into the crispy world of deep-fried seaweed rolls, offering a crunchy exterior wrapped around a soft, flavorful filling.

foods.name: Edamame (Salted Soybean in Pod)
foods.description: Enjoy a simple, yet satisfying snack of edamame. Each order serves these lightly salted soybeans in the pod, perfect for a healthy, nibble-worthy treat.

foods.name: Tang Su Yuk (Deep-Fried Pork)
foods.description: A serving of crispy deep-fried pork, bathed in a tangy sweet & sour sauce. This dish is a delightful blend of textures and flavors, offering a satisfying crunch with every bite.

foods.name: Takoyaki (Octopus Balls)
foods.description: Savor the flavors of Japan with our Takoyaki. Each order presents a piece of grilled octopus ball, smothered in Takoyaki sauce, for a warm, savory treat with a chewy octopus center.

foods.name: Potato & Veg Croquette
foods.description: Crispy on the outside, soft and flavorful on the inside, our deep-fried mashed potato and vegetable croquette is a comforting piece of culinary delight, blending smooth potatoes with vibrant veggies.

foods.name: Ssam (Lettuce Wrap)
foods.description: Wrap your senses around our Ssam, offering a piece of Lettuce to wrap your BBQ meat for a burst of flavor in every bite.

foods.name: Bulgogi (Marinated Beef)
foods.description: Succulent slices of beef marinated in a blend of soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, and garlic, then grilled to perfection.

foods.name: Woo-samgyeob (Thin Slice Beef Brisket)
foods.description: Delicate thin slices of beef brisket, offering a tender texture and rich flavor, ideal for grilling.

foods.name: Beef Sausage
foods.description: Juicy and flavorful beef sausage, a perfect addition to any BBQ feast.

foods.name: Spicy Dwaeji Bulgogi (Marinated Spicy Pork)
foods.description: Tender pork slices marinated in a fiery sauce, bringing a spicy kick to your BBQ.

foods.name: Dwaeji Galbi (Marinated Pork Ribs)
foods.description: Succulent pork ribs soaked in a savory marinade, ready to sizzle on the grill.

foods.name: Samgyeopsal-Gui (Pork Belly)
foods.description: A Korean BBQ staple, thick slices of pork belly with a rich and satisfying flavor.

foods.name: Thin Samgyeopsal-Gui (Thin Slice Pork Belly)
foods.description: Thinly sliced pork belly that crisps up beautifully on the grill, offering a lighter but equally delicious option.

foods.name: Spicy Dak Bulgogi (Marinated Spicy Chicken)
foods.description: Juicy chicken marinated in a spicy and sweet sauce, delivering a kick of flavor with every bite.

foods.name: Ganjang Dak Bulgogi (Marinated Chicken with Soy Sauce)
foods.description: Tender chicken pieces soaked in a rich soy sauce marinade, offering a savory and slightly sweet flavor.
